Democracy Park () is a historic park located in Central Park,  Jung District, Busan, South Korea. It was established on October 16, 1999 in honor of the protestors who participated in the various democratic movements that led to the democratization of South Korea, including those of the April Revolution, Busan–Masan Democracy Movement, and June Democracy Movement.
There is a memorial hall to the democracy movement in the park. There is also an amphitheater and various nature spots.
